Interface Subsystem<Component extends GameComponent>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AISystem, PhysicsSystem, RenderSystem
public interface Subsystem<Component extends GameComponent>

Author:
Jason Welch Subsystems are components of the game that manage various game components and are used to separate logic.
